summary: Have you or a loved one lost your head? Well, fret no longer! JanusForbeare\'s Recapitation will restore your missing cranium in no time at all.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffca0d][b][u]DESCRIPTION[/color][/b][/u]

This mod adds two new items to the game - the Staff of Recapitation and Recapitation Salve.

Both are scripted to remove the effects of decapitation (ie. losing one\'s head).

They can be found in a chest in the northern corner of the Temple of Kynareth, in Whiterun.

[color=#ffca0d][b][u]HOW TO INSTALL[/color][/b][/u]

extract the files into:
...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check the box for \"JanusForbeare\'s Recapitation.esp\"

OR

-Download with Nexus Mod Manager
-In NMM \"Mods\" window, find \"JanusForbeare\'s Recapitation.esp\", highlight it, and click on \"Activate mod\" at left

[color=#ffca0d][b][u]CHANGELOG[/color][/b][/u]

1.1

-Corrected a typo on the supply chest.
author: JanusForbeare
